Highlights in Jazz #17: Salute to Swing! The Music of Ellington, Goodman, Basie and others - Joe Newman, Zoot Sims, Phil Bodner, Bucky Pizzarelli, George Duvivier, Panama Francis, Hank Jones, Maxine Sullivan, David Lee (Tape 2 of 2)

Highlights in Jazz #17: Salute to Swing! The Music of Ellington, Goodman, Basie and others - Joe Newman, Zoot Sims, Phil Bodner, Bucky Pizzarelli, George Duvivier, Panama Francis, Hank Jones, Maxine Sullivan, David Lee (Tape 2 of 2)
This tape is labeled Tape 2 of 2. The University Archives does not have Tape 1.

Original format: 1/2 inch open reel video; Transfer Technician Notes: "Entirety of tape suffers from a constant control track error. Multiple TBCs were tested to obtain the best capture possible. Content suffers from persistent flagging throughout, as a result of the inherent control track error. Recurring mild tape wear and dropouts throughout. Occasional mild ghosting. Inherent mild audio distortion is inherent to the original recording."
